page.title: 06Earning a Living in Tipton.
page.content: People have to work to earn their living in Tipton. People do lots of different jobs, like a secretary,teacher,councillor,office worker. There are lots of factories to work in.There are lots of people who don't have jobs and they go on the dole.The people who do not have jobs get their money from the DHSS.Some other jobs are Dustbin men,lorry drivers,shop assistants, jewellers, railway men, bankers,postmen,milkmen, bus drivers,taxi drivers, business men,market stall holders,computer shop assistants,garage men,builders, cooks, publicans.Those are some of the jobs people do to earn a living in Tipton.
